name: Blue Bird & The Baddies
description:
Comment below if you want any changes! I will add a volume controller soon.

Fun little game with cool characters, the goal is to dodge the big bird and his group of baddies to get as many points as you can.  Sit back relax and enjoy the awesome music created by my brother! 

Created by: Lucidly                                 "Lucas Liberatore" 

Music: Love Lost                                       "Jacob Liberatore"

Thanks for playing :D
